Description: Papyrus fragment of a "contract/guarantee for tithe or pactum collection (?)" (Clackson). On recto, parts of 11 lines qrittenalong the fibres and the left margin are preserved; the last 4 lines are practically illegible. On verso is one faint line of text written across the fibres in a different hand. Mounted with EA 75320, 75318, 75317, 75316, 75315.
Curator's comments: This fragment may record a 'pactum' payment of 'three ... less six and a half (ll. 4-6).
Bibliographic references: Clackson 2000 / Coptic and Greek Texts relating to the Hermopolite Monastery of Apa Apollo (p.12, 74-5, pl.11)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (86579) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/86579)
